definition[0]: off-the-peg clothes are made in standard sizes, not made especially to fit one person
definition[1]: an off-the-peg arrangement, product etc is a standard one, rather than one designed for a particular person, situation etc
example[0]: With travel insurance, you can get an off-the-peg policy for a single trip, or one tailor-made for the places you are likely to visit during a whole year.
